item.title: BTC Market Cap Shiny
item.description: LinkedIn Last week I was invited to publish a short article about the recent news of Bitcoin gaining a billion USD in market cap over last week. I believed that the best way to contribute my unique view was to create a small application similar to many of the analytics projects and dashboards that I develop and maintain as part of my current position. The resulting article can be viewed here on LinkedIn: https://www.
